sentences.cn: 一场毫无成效的营销活动

sentences.en: An ineffective person should not be our leader.
sentences.cn: 无能的人不该当我们的领导者.

sentences.en: Eastern European pollution control has been notoriously ineffective.
sentences.cn: 东欧的污染控制一直以无效而闻名.

sentences.en: Furthermore, they claim that any such interference is completely ineffective.
sentences.cn: 此外，他们还声称任何这样的干预都是完全无效的。

sentences.en: Heat transfer is relatively ineffective in diffuse gases.
sentences.cn: 热转移在弥漫气体中的效率比较低.

sentences.en: In this discussion with Micah the wiry old captain tended to ignore his ineffective Son, Bromley.
sentences.cn: 在同弥迦谈这类事情时,精明的老船工有意忽略他的无能的儿子布朗利.

sentences.en: Intensely fractured rocks may render traps ineffective by causing leakage.
sentences.cn: 强烈破碎的岩石造成石油、天然气泄漏而使得圈闭变得不起作用.

sentences.en: It is forgery even if the document is incomplete or ineffective in law.
sentences.cn: 即使此伪造的文件在法律上是不完整的或失效的,其行为也构成了伪造罪.

sentences.en: It proved ineffective to limit administrative discretion through tightening rules and procedures.
sentences.cn: 通过制定更严密的规则和程序来控制自由裁量权的传统方式是失效的.

sentences.en: She is totally ineffective as a teacher, ie She cannot teach satisfactorily.
The air - conditioner was ineffective in such a crowded room.
sentences.cn: 在挤那么多人的房间里空气调节器不起作用了.

sentences.en: The court is ineffective because it lacks the necessary enforcement machinery.
sentences.cn: 法院效率低是因为缺乏必要的执行机制.

sentences.en: Their unions, once ineffective and docile , are now powerful tools in the collective bargaining process.
sentences.cn: 他们的工会, 过去曾经是无能为力的和驯服的, 而今是集体交涉中有力的工具.

sentences.en: This is an ineffective method of controlling your dog.
sentences.cn: 用这种方法控制你的狗不起作用。

words.tran_cn: 无效的，不起作用的；徒劳无益的
无用的人；无一技之长者
无效的，失效的；不起作用的

trans.tran_cn: 无效果的，无效率的，不起作用的
trans.tran_en: something that is ineffective does not achieve what it is intended to achieve
